thread.title: Moody's sees limited impact of U.S. tariffs on Chinese exports, economy

title: Moody's sees limited impact of U.S. tariffs on Chinese exports, economy
text:
April 11, 2018 / 4:24 AM / Updated 27 minutes ago Moody's sees limited impact of U.S. tariffs on Chinese exports, economy Reuters Staff 1 Min Read 
(Reuters) - Moody’s Investors Service said on Wednesday the direct impact of the proposed U.S. tariffs on China’s exports and economy will be limited but the “knock-on effects” are expected to be wider. A Chinese ship is anchored at Port of Santos while being loaded with soybeans in Santos May 19, 2015. REUTERS/Paulo Whitaker/File Photo 
The global ratings agency said it expects the U.S. and China will prevent a "significant escalation" in their trade dispute going by the negative impact the restrictions will have on both economies. bit.ly/2GOXerr Reporting by Kanishka Singh in Bengaluru; Editing by Gopakumar Warrier
